argument.name: panelName
argument.description: The panel containing the part you want to query.

argument.name: panelPart
argument.description: The part you want the id from. Can be 'header', 'body', or 'footer'.

page.description: Gets the ID of the specified 'part' of a Panel.
page.discussion: Gets the ID of the specified 'part' of a Panel. The 'part' can be 'header', 'body', or 'footer'. Getting the ID of a Panel part is useful if you want to set properties (such as the Inner HTML) of the Panel.
